Reasonable price, friendly staffs and great service. Highly recommended salon. Massage therapists were skilled too.

juzcrap ham
Local Guide·56 reviews·66 photos
Rated 4.0 out of 5,
Have enjoyed every massage session ive had so far. Be it a foot reflexology or body rub-down.. the therapists here are polite and skillful. Knowing exactly where the pressure points are. They are also sensitive to your body's response to the pressure they exert. Prices are reasonable too.
Reservations are advised for weekends.

It’s my wife and my go-to place to massage away the aches and pains. The therapists are skilful and will apply the strength according to your level of comfort.
